TextLibrary.Text: Drong
Drong hears that you pretty tough. You fight lots of Ogres and win.

I only fight to protect my homeland. I have no quarrel with you.

Drong don't care about that. Drong not interested in fighting. Drong only interested in EATING.

So how can I help you, Drong?

Drong need somebody tough to go and catch a Dragon Spider. Drong never eaten one before.

Where can I find one of these Dragon Spiders?

Where can I find one of these Dragon Spiders?
They live in Dragon Valley up north. Drong give you magic hat if you get one and bring it to his tower!
